channel.title: Help with a few things
channel.description: 1. How do i decrease xp per hit. 2. How do i change a new start point 3. If i walk into the wild it says safe on screen. how do i cange that?

item.title: Help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Sage Mode, post:2, topic:311871”]1. hitdiff in client.java
2. search home coords in client java
3. Not to sure sorry, this is all for 317 btw, if your talking 508 msg me.[/quote]

  1. Wrong.
  2. Wrong.
  3. …
  1. Search for
TotalExp = (double)

The xp given will be called with the addSkillXP() method, something like:

addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4);
  1. The coords of first spawn are declared in the player class (player.java), so open it up, and search for:
        // initial x and y coordinates of the player
        // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper
        // initialization packet

The coords will look something like:

        teleportToX = 2547;// 3072;
        teleportToY = 3091;// 3312;
  1. Search for (in client.java)
"Safe"

There will be a few things found, just delete whatever is relevant to what you want deleted.

Read full topic
